short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Everytime you go to YouTube to start procrastinating, Benson will remind you to get back to work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Benson Motivation" is a Chrome extension designed to help you maintain your focus and productivity. It's a simple tool with a powerful impact.

Do you find yourself drifting off to YouTube when you're supposed to be working or studying? This extension is here to help. Every time you navigate to YouTube, "Benson Motivation" replaces the video thumbnails with a custom image of Benson from Regular Show telling you to get back to work.

The extension is easy to install and requires no configuration. Once installed, it operates quietly in the background, stepping in only when you stray onto YouTube during your work or study time.

Stay focused, stay productive, and let "Benson Motivation" help you resist the temptation of procrastination.
